Getting started with NextJS

Nextjs is a framwork for ReactJs wait a second ... a "framework" for react? Isn't Reast itself already a framwork for JavaScript? well ... first of all, react is a "liberary" for JavaScript,that seems to be important for some people. In this articel, we'll dive into the core concepts and features NextJS has to offer:

  • File-based Routing
  • Built-in Page Pre-rendering
  • Rich Data Fetching Capabilities
  • Image Optimization
  • Much More
